Who are we?

We are a construction and maintenance company specialising in roofing and based in South West London but covering all of London as well as Surrey, Berkshire and Hampshire.

We have decades of experience within our ranks and all of our teams are fully qualified, experts in their field with an attitude that ensures we never leave a client without giving them a five star service.

We currently work for the majority of large house builders in the UK along with the largest estate agencies in London, various maintenance companies and property developers.

It is our promise that we will attend to any issue within 24 hours of receiving the enquiry and our teams are equipped with the latest technology to ensure we really can assess any issues or questions you may have whilst keeping those all important costs to a bare minimum!

New Build Construction

With decades of experience in the new build housing sector, we really do know what we are talking about when it comes to building houses!

Whether it is a single luxury house being built or 100 units for a large house builder, we have you covered!

Domestic, Repair & Maintenance Work

Whether it is a whole new roof you need or simply a couple of tiles changed on your porch, no job is too big or too small! Working alongside some of the largest estate agents and property management companies in the country, we really do know what our customers want and will go that extra mile to ensure we deliver!

Roofing

At GHD Contracting, we undertake all elements of roofing works. Our teams will ensure you get the highest level of workmanship in both pitched and flat roofing.

Whether you need a single tile replacing or a large flat roof on a new build development of apartments, we are here to help!

Bricklaying & Pointing

Having worked on large new build housing developments all over the UK, our bricklaying teams are nothing short of the best in the business.

We also have specialist pointing and brick cleaning teams to ensure we are able to assist no matter what you brickwork or masonary requirements are.
